content: - pg 14 please help us support initiatives aimed at screening and assisting women with breast cancer pink drive mobile mammography unit and awareness http //www pinkdrive co za/donate-via-paypal/ also we will be donating a percentage of all pearl of hope yarn kit sales to breast cancer awareness and screening charities until the end of october 2017 big thanks always to my testers m mohr j verster n shutler l kay d tetreult for more visit us on email queries to hosteam@hookedonsunshine co keeping you hooked until next time
